components.text:
Curses at their core are the same as any other circle magic, however the level of the curse is increased by the skill of the caster.

Witches with a cat familiar or those who perform the rite with a coven will be more skilled at cursing others.

To remove a curse, a witch must perform the appropriate cleansing rite.

Cleanses have a level raised in the same way as curses, making them more likely to succeed or fail. Failed removals will only make a curse stronger.
